QuestData.Title: Chaotic Runes
QuestData.Description:
<A series of unintelligible lines has been inscribed onto ancient parchment.
Ve'nari would value this.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Chaotic Runes to Ve'nari at Ve'nari's Refuge.
QuestData.RewardText:
Ah, yes. These were clearly written by someone in the grip of madness.
That is not to say that they are nonsense, however. Sometimes, only the insane can see the truth.
